542e6e5f-42b5-49a7-acf9-6843ce6d821d.description: This entry-level qualification is designed to get people started in the Customs profession. It introduces you to the fundamentals of customs practice and procedure, including the basics of how to prepare customs declarations for exports and imports. On successful completion of this introductory course you will gain a general understanding and knowledge of the key concepts, relevant processes and terminology of the customs profession, and an awareness of the resources available to you.
542e6e5f-42b5-49a7-acf9-6843ce6d821d.name: Level 2: Customs Practice & Procedure Award

badge_template_activities.title: The Level 2 comprises of 6 modules: • Introduction to Trade and Customs • Customs Processes and Procedures • Calculating Import Duty • Customs Declarations • Export and Import Controls • Other Matters

91b2b0a3-de6f-4d96-9447-283ab143f3a7.description: This intermediate qualification is designed to provide you with sufficient knowledge to prepare and lodge customs declarations with HMRC. On successful completion of this qualification you will have a comprehensive understanding of customs processes and procedures, including import, export and special procedures. You will also gain a sound understanding of the core compliance areas of classification, origin, valuation, duty calculation & import and export declaration procedures and requirements.
91b2b0a3-de6f-4d96-9447-283ab143f3a7.name: Level 3: Certificate in Customs Compliance

badge_template_activities.title: The Certificate in Customs Compliance consists of six modules: Customs Law and Regulation; Customs Processes and Procedures; Tariff Classification; Rules of Origin Customs; Valuation; Customs Declarations

e75293b5-e452-4570-b255-f28c9d950b14.description: On successful completion of this qualification you will have a comprehensive understanding of customs processes and procedures, including import, export and special procedures. You will gain a sound understanding of the core compliance areas of classification, origin, valuation and duty calculation and will gain sound knowledge of import and export declaration procedures and requirements. You will also gain advanced knowledge of excise duties and procedures, export licensing controls and AEO.
e75293b5-e452-4570-b255-f28c9d950b14.name: Level 4: Certificate in Advanced Customs Compliance

badge_template_activities.title: The Level 4 comprises of nine modules: Customs Law and Regulation; Customs Processes and Procedures; Tariff Classification; Rules of Origin; Customs Valuation; Customs Declarations; Understanding of AEO requirements; Excise Duties and Procedures and Export Licencing Controls

15e8d934-4fe5-4dc1-afd7-0f3a5c10512e.description: This qualification covers a comprehensive and in-depth range of topics in customs compliance and regulation. Successful completion of this award, combined with the Level 4 Certificate in Advanced Customs Compliance, will provide you with the necessary knowledge and skills to competently perform the wide range of activities expected of a customs professional, both in the UK and overseas.
15e8d934-4fe5-4dc1-afd7-0f3a5c10512e.name: Level 5: Diploma in Advanced Customs Compliance

badge_template_activities.title: Throughout the course learners are required to answer a series of questions relating to the module that they are studying. Questions take a variety of forms, including tariff classification, duty calculation, declaration completion and more.  These Knowledge Checks represent 50% of the final mark in the course. Learners are also required to complete two written assignments that relate to the practical application of Customs procedures in the working environment.

97a3742e-466e-46a6-a8f2-5210297c96fc.description: This entry-level qualification is designed to get people started in the Customs profession. It introduces you to the fundamentals of customs practice and procedure, including the basics of how to prepare customs declarations for exports and imports. On successful completion of this introductory course, you will gain a general understanding and knowledge of the key concepts, relevant processes and terminology of the customs profession, and an awareness of the resources available to you.
97a3742e-466e-46a6-a8f2-5210297c96fc.name: Level 2 UK: Customs Practice & Procedure Award
